full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### ITM2 Consultancy Services for CIPO

#### Notice Type
*English: Request for Proposal - Competitive Selective Tendering*
*French: Demande de propositions - Appel d'offres concurrentiel sélectif*

#### Solicitation Number
WS3662608305

#### Publication Date
2023-01-23

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-03-29T14:00:00

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-06-15

#### Unsolicited Proposal Area of Interest
Information Technology Consultation Services (UNSPSC: 80101507)

#### Contracting Entity
*English: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)*
*French: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)*

#### Procurement Category
Services (SRV)

#### Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (RCN)

## Request for Proposal
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to submit a proposal for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the IT Modernization initiative Phase 2 (ITM2). This contract will provide technical consultative services to support the Canadian Intellectual Property Office (CIPO) in its digital transformation.

## Contract Description
The proposed contract aims to deliver technical services for two distinct requirements: (1) CIPO Digital Services (CDS), and (2) Intellectual Property Rights Management Services (IPRMS). The services will include the planning, development, and implementation of digital solutions for CIPO.

## Selection Process
The selection process will be based on the evaluation of technical merits and price using the combined evaluation methodology.

## Important Dates
*Publication Date:* 2023-01-23
*Amendment Date:* 2023-03-22
*Tender Closing Date:* 2023-03-29T14:00:00
*Expected Contract Start Date:* 2023-06-15

## Additional Information
*Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others*
*Regions of Opportunity: None*

You can find the official tender notice at [the URL given](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14604345?extsite=MTQ2MDQzNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1
